blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

blog.name: party-with-books
blog.title: That's the Story of My Life
blog.description: |Welcome to a Bookdragon's organized mess! | Things to know: I'm a total nerd and Child of the One True King. A connoisseur of books, Anime, movies/tv shows (O.U.A.T, Miraculous Ladybug, Sherlock, DW, TMNT, Fairy Tail, Yuri On Ice, The Flash, HTTYD, etc...), all things Marvel, Strange Magic, a super big Sonic fan, artistic/crafty things, culinary arts, Ireland/Scotland, theater and still more! |Check out my other fan crazy blog if you want! http://your-gonna-be-popular.tumblr.com Or my aestetic side blog! https://traveling-gypsy-chef.tumblr.com|

tags: no good cop bad cop only this
summary: When they’re trying to persuade or interrogate someone, or generally working together on a Plan(TM), Beau and Caleb are always...
body: When they’re trying to persuade or interrogate someone, or generally working together on a Plan™, Beau and Caleb are always playing, like, Feral Cop-Personable Cop, but they’re constantly switching out which of them is which. Anyway it’s fantastic, I love it

summary: Nott's one hit single
body:
Nott’s one hit single

Me and Yeza,Yeza, Yeza are getting back together.

Meeeee and Yeza,Yeza,Yeza are getting back together.

My girl talks to my boy who talks to my girl who talks to me.

But meeeee and Yeza,Yeza,Yeza are getting back together.

To the toon of We are never getting back together by Taylor Swift.
